FuncDef:
The traffic-segment unknown-segment command configures the behavior of an unknown EPG.
The undo traffic-segment unknown-segment command deletes the behavior of an unknown EPG. The traffic-segment unknown-segment command configures the behavior of an unknown EPG. The undo traffic-segment unknown-segment command deletes the behavior of an unknown EPG. By default, the access control policy for unknown EPG members is permit. That is, unknown EPG members can communicate with each other. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
